## BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams.frontendTag property

Address that will receive MP rewards from newly created Stability Deposits by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly frontendTag?: string;
```

## Remarks

For example [depositBPDInStabilityPool(amount, frontendTag?)](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.depositbpdinstabilitypool.md) will tag newly made Stability Deposits with this address when its `frontendTag` parameter is omitted.
